name: mr. Finger
description:
Have you ever ran out of space on your phone? Well Mr. Finger does help him to free some space on his phone, you might discover some weird things about him or his family and friends.

Notes:

-I tried to add some personality to the narrator something like in the world of goo (loved that game)

-the music on the 4th level it's not mine but from David Bergeaud, Ratchet and Clank 3,  Courtney Gears Battle, (no copyright infringement intended).

-Any kind of feedback is really appreciated
